onboard1_description: All processes related to your site management are at your fingertips with one touch.
onboard2_description: After registering to Apti, you can start using it with the approval of your site management and meet the priviliged world of Apti.
onboard3_description: Benefit from practical, fast and rational solutions for all kinds of transactions in your living space with artificial intelligence.
onboard4_description: Easy access, time saving, transparent management approach and a participatory site life await you at Apti.

login_validation_text.login_email_valid_text: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
login_validation_text.login_password_valid_text: Your password must be between 4 and 15 characters

login_error_textbutton.login_isempty_text: Please do not leave these fields blank
login_error_textbutton.login_iswrong_text: Your e-mail address and/or password is incorrect.

forgot_password_email.forget_card_desc_text: A link will be sent to your e-mail address to reset your password. You can click on the link and set your new password.
forgot_password_email.forget_card_email_succes_title_text: Password Change Link Sent To Your Email Address!
forgot_password_email.forget_card_email_succes_desc_text: We have sent an e-mail to your …… address. You can click on the link sent to your e-mail address and set your new password.
forgot_password_email.forget_card_email_spam_text: The e-mail we sent may have gone into the spam folder.
forgot_password_email.forget_card_email_resend_text: If you are sure that you have typed your e-mail address correctly and that there is no corresponding e-mail in your spam folder, click to resend the password change e-mail.

change_password_card.change_password_card_desc: Set your new password to use in your Apti subscription.

change_password_success.change_password_success_title: Your Password Has Been Changed Successfully!
change_password_success.change_password_success_subtext: You can login using your new password.

signin_card.signin_offer_desc_text: I would like to receive electronic messages within the scope of Riza Text to be informed about the campaigns.
signin_card.signin_bottom_desc_text: Your personal data is processed within the scope of the Clarification Text. By clicking the Register button, you confirm that you have read and accepted the Personal Data Protection Policy, Privacy Policy, User Agreement and Cookie Policy.

signin_validation_text.signin_email_valid_text: Please enter a valid e-mail address
signin_validation_text.signin_password_valid_text: Your password must be between 4 and 15 characters.

app_otp.otp_card_desc_text: Please enter the verification code sent to your e-mail address in the field below.
app_otp.otp_card_valid_text: The verification code is incorrect. Please try again.
